Breaking: House Democrats just passed landmark reforms to restore our democracy: H.R. 1, “For the People Act”
 
We are making good on our promise to the American people & working to build a government that is responsible, ethical and is truly of, by and for the people!

text:
.@repjoecrowley: Yesterday, the president said his response to Puerto Rico was a ‘success.’

- 2975 Americans dead
- Families without power & water for months
- The island struggling to rebuild 

That’s what @POTUS calls a success. I have another phrase for it: abject failure.
